simple.escp

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.Template
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonTemplate

    public abstract class Template
extends java.lang.Object
    Template represent a template used for printing. A single Template can be printed many times with different values.

    • Method Detail

      • getPageFormat

        public PageFormat getPageFormat()
        Retrieve current PageFormat associated with this template.
        Returns:
        an instance of PageFormat for this template.

      • parse

        public abstract Report parse()
        Parse the template into a text. This is usually executed only once and generates result as Pages.
        Returns:
        result of parsing in an instance of Report.
